remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许您在详细信息视图中对控件的外观进行自定义 (或所有者描述)。 The event lets you customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a control in the details view. 当 控件的属性设置为`true`并且其属性设置为时, 控件将引发该事件。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to `true` and its property is set to . 传递给事件处理程序的包含有关要绘制的的信息, 还提供可帮助您绘制标头的方法。 The passed to the event handler contains information about the to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the header. 使用属性可检索有关要绘制的列标题的信息。Use the property to retrieve information about the column header to draw. 使用属性可以在由属性指定的区域内执行实际绘图。 Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要绘制不需要自定义的标准元素, 请使用和方法。To draw standard elements that do not need customization, use the and methods. 如果希望操作系统绘制子项, 请使用属性。Use the property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem. 如果你只想要自定义特定标头, 这会很有用。This is useful when you want to customize only specific headers. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免在所有者绘制时图形闪烁的问题, 请重写控件并将`true`属性设置为。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 当应用程序调用方法时, 此功能仅在 windows XP 和 windows Server 2003 家族上可用。This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为控件提供自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 该示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 具有负值的子项具有红色的前景和黑色背景。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 事件的处理程序绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 事件的处理程序绘制文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 事件的处理程序绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. 组件提供一种在详细信息视图和列表视图之间切换的方法。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中, 只会触发事件。In the list view, only the event is fired. 在这种情况下, 会在事件处理程序中绘制文本和背景。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler.
